body:
Hi Ejnar, Run EnergyPlus in silent mode is possible. If you don't want to see command shell, you should write "2" into a panel component and connect it to runEnergyPlus_. However, when you run simulations your machine will be frozen, thus you cannot edit your workflow anyway. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/cLrAd6kUb1BWn3Oyp6zZ4ZBt9FUZPQKzplEYoEoKNVn8JCtXZCDzXory*PhI0C0cj9gks0e7fAJEzfgKUd85NXZq2w*zrbNi/background_runEP.png) Best
Antonello
